name: Picnic Rush!
description:
Your hill is going through a food shortage and your queen sends you on a mission to gather the food crumbs left behind by humans and their picnics! Avoid enemy bugs and human hazards by using the different routes and power-ups to your advantage!

Artists: Yemar Rodriguez (yemarrodriguez1@gmail.com) & Roberto Acosta (racosta23ef@gmail.com)

Programmers: Rafael Martinez (Rafaelmartinez060@gmail.com) & Brian G. Gonzalez
